name: DUO (itch)
description:
Entry for GMTK Jam (7/16/2017) A Tiny Platformer. It is a soul reaper that is collecting souls. You can change into spirit form by pressing down key. Enjoy!

Controls: wasd or arrow keys to move/jump

Known Issues: If you fall into a pit game does not restart

The music is low so you might have to put the volume up to hear it.
